quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
name: William Barclay

quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
name: Voltaire

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
name: Ausonius

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age.
name: Booth Tarkington

quote: Every birthday is a gift. Every day is a gift.
name: Aretha Franklin

quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
name: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: It takes a long time to become young.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
name: Sammy Hagar

quote: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
name: George Meredith

quote: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words.
name: Plautus

quote: Youth has no age.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: All the world is birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much.
name: George Harrison

quote: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
name: Steven Wright

quote: You don't get older, you get better.
name: Shirley Bassey

quote: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The only thing better than singing is more singing.
name: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: I kept a diary right after I was born. Day 1: Tired from the move. Day 2: Everyone thinks I'm an idiot.
name: Steven Wright

quote: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Love the giver more than the gift.
name: Brigham Young

quote: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn't have one. So I got a cake.
name: Mitch Hedberg

quote: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
name: Robert Frost

quote: The way I see it, you should live everyday like its your birthday.
name: Paris Hilton

quote: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
name: Bob Hope

quote: At my age flowers scare me.
name: George Burns

quote: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
name: Jean Paul

quote: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: Let them eat cake.
name: Marie Antoinette

quote: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it.
name: Boris Johnson

quote: I remember when the candle shop burned down. Everyone stood around singing 'Happy Birthday.'
name: Steven Wright

quote: My life is better with every year of living it.
name: Rachel Maddow

quote: We'll take the cake with the red cherry on top.
name: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: People give one another things that can't be gift wrapped.
name: Nadine Gordimer

quote: There is still no cure for the common birthday.
name: John Glenn

quote: I had a birthday party with my family and friends at a house, and Chipotle catered. It was beautiful.
name: Ansel Elgort

quote: Handmade presents are scary because they reveal that you have too much free time.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: I binge when I'm happy. When everything is going really well, every day is like I'm at a birthday party.
name: Kirstie Alley

quote: Did you know you're supposed to soap and scrub for as long as it takes to sing 'Happy Birthday' twice?
name: Faith Salie

quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I can't make eye contact when people sing 'Happy Birthday' to me.
name: Dove Cameron

quote: One of the shocks of a 50th birthday is realizing the fundamental fact that your youth is irrevocably over.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: I was in kidney failure. I ended up having a kidney transplant on my 21st birthday.
name: Amy Purdy

quote: I crashed my boyfriend's birthday when I was 12 years old. He didn't invite me and so I showed up.
name: Isla Fisher

quote: I love a card. You know, cards? At birthdays? I collect them.
name: Adele

quote: I have 'Happy Birthday' in multiple languages on my iPod - I like to play it at company birthday parties.
name: Yigal Azrouel

quote: I like to keep my birthday very relaxed.
name: Barun Sobti

quote: The best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
name: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: To give somebody your time is the biggest gift you can give.
name: Franka Potente

quote: A gift, with a kind countenance, is a double present.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: A friend never defends a husband who gets his wife an electric skillet for her birthday.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: For the youth, the indignation of most things will just surge as each birthday passes.
name: Chris Evans

quote: It is lovely, when I forget all birthdays, including my own, to find that somebody remembers me.
name: Ellen Glasgow

quote: If you can give your child only one gift, let it be enthusiasm.
name: Bruce Barton

quote: I'm not materialistic. I believe in presents from the heart, like a drawing that a child does.
name: Victoria Beckham

quote: I'm most comfortable in my birthday suit.
name: Amanda Seyfried

quote: I gave a funny speech at my wife's birthday party, and I'm thinking, 'Hey, I've still got it.'
name: Larry David

quote: Jesus' birthday is commercialized, so of course, Black History Month is commercialized.
name: Jidenna

quote: When someone asks if you'd like cake or pie, why not say you want cake and pie?
name: Lisa Loeb

quote: The worst part about celebrating another birthday is the shock that you're only as well as you are.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: I like working on my birthday, so I always do.
name: Abhishek Bachchan

quote: My first proper kiss was from Cara Shucksmith when I was 13 or 14 at her birthday party.
name: Robert Webb

quote: For Tim Burton's birthday I gave him a rainbow beetle. He loved it!
name: Eva Green

quote: My mom and my father's birthday are on the same day.
name: Victor Cruz

quote: My every birthday wish was, 'I want to someday be on TV.'
name: Awkwafina

quote: My wife and I love to travel, so if we don't have work on either her or my birthday, we definitely travel.
name: Barun Sobti

quote: My birthday is in November, so I think I'm a Scorpio? I'm not even sure!
name: Ryan Hurd

quote: Birthday Alarm was a very simple site based on being reminded of your friends' birthdays.
name: Michael Birch

quote: My mother asked me what I wanted for my birthday, so I said I wanted to read poetry with her.
name: Guy Johnson

quote: The day before my 16th birthday I got my guitar.
name: Stevie Nicks

quote: I left school on my 15th birthday.
name: David Bailey

quote: I just had my 30th birthday and we went turkey shooting. It's what I wanted to do, so we went.
name: Kelly Clarkson

quote: I've never really made a big deal out of my birthday.
name: Nikki Reed

quote: I'm not a big birthday guy; I never have been.
name: Lewis Black

quote: I'm not going to be caught around here for any fool celebration. To hell with birthdays!
name: Norman Rockwell

quote: The first guitar I ever got was for my 13th birthday.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: I am 23, the year of the iron birthday, the gate of darkness. I am ill.
name: Allen Ginsberg

quote: I have given myself a Tesla for my 60th birthday.
name: Stanley Druckenmiller

quote: I love having my birthday at Australia Zoo.
name: Bindi Irwin

quote: I just remember celebrating my 18th birthday at home, so that was a big party.
name: Angelique Kerber

quote: For my fifth birthday, I got a small tennis racket. That's how I started.
name: Ana Ivanovic

quote: Does Martin Luther King really want his birthday commercialized?
name: Jidenna

quote: I always wanted to shave. It is a very natural process. For my birthday I got a lot of shaving stuff.
name: Chaz Bono

quote: Nick Swardson used to have birthday paint parties. They were phenomenal.
name: Craig Robinson

quote: I definitely break out karaoke when my friends have birthday parties.
name: Josh Groban

quote: I love photography. My boyfriend's got a great camera, which I bought for his birthday.
name: Sarah Sutton

quote: Like many women my age, I am 28 years old.
name: Mary Schmich

quote: I'm a summer baby, so I usually have my birthday as a good summer memory.
name: Sloane Crosley

quote: At 91, every day is a birthday.
name: Charlotte Rae

quote: I am the guy dressing up in, you know, the caveman outfit for the kids' birthday parties.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: As a child, I always chose a false nose and some face paint and a wig for my birthday.
name: Ashley Jensen

quote: My parents split before my fifth birthday, and I moved with Mom and my three siblings to her native Oahu.
name: Janet Mock

quote: I was put on a pony as a kid at some birthday party when you're all led around.
name: Victoria Pendleton

quote: The question on my husband's birthday is always, What do you get for the man who has nothing?
name: Pamela Druckerman

quote: I had been offered a Hollywood contract before my 18th birthday. It gave me the spark I needed.
name: Gene Tierney

quote: When I was little I thought, isn't it nice that everybody celebrates on my birthday? Because it's July 4th.
name: Gloria Stuart

quote: I like spending time with my family and friends on my birthday.
name: Prabhas

quote: Only then, approaching my fortieth birthday, I made philosophy my life's work.
name: Karl Jaspers

quote: I think my first album was a gift for my birthday and a Faith Hill album; I loved her.
name: Sara Sampaio

quote: My mother always bought our birthday gifts.
name: Bruce Eric Kaplan

quote: On my birthday, I was in Milan for the collections.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: My mom FedExes a red velvet cake she makes from scratch to me every birthday.
name: Molly Sims

quote: I don't set up screenings. I can barely plan my kid's birthday party.
name: Becky Albertalli

quote: I was born in Korea and left before my first birthday.
name: Mary H.K. Choi

quote: Since the day I got married, I never got to plan my birthday.
name: Barun Sobti

quote: If I'm about to forget my kid's birthday, I want the phone to scream at me until I do something about it.
name: Sundar Pichai

quote: In 1980, shortly before my 11th birthday, I wrote my first essay in English.
name: Pankaj Mishra

quote: I love mayonnaise. Every birthday when I was a kid I'd go to Black Angus and just dip my burger in mayo.
name: Blake Anderson

quote: My mother still sends a cake to the office for my birthday.
name: David Ulevitch

quote: I don't go into a fight mad. I go into a fight like it's my birthday. I love what I'm doing.
name: Paige VanZant

quote: It is really a great feeling to win a World Cup on your birthday.
name: Nino Schurter

quote: My mom won't let me buy high-fashion stuff unless it's TK Maxx or a birthday occasion.
name: Chloe Grace Moretz

quote: I don't like to party. I like to spend time with family on my birthday.
name: Virender Sehwag

quote: I met Leonardo DiCaprio and Busta Rhymes the same night, on my birthday in New York.
name: Jason Mitchell

quote: I have angel wings and a halo on my wrist, which I got done on my 30th birthday in memory of my brother.
name: Sheridan Smith

quote: My dad bought me a dartboard for my 11th birthday, and I became intrigued by the game.
name: Eric Bristow

quote: I saw a man killed in front of my eyes just before my eighth birthday.
name: Peter O'Toole

quote: Nicole Richie invited me to her birthday party, and it was at Michael Jackson's Neverland!
name: Gaby Hoffmann

quote: On my fourth or fifth birthday, a guitar was given to me, and I made a new friend. A very loud friend.
name: Eliot Sumner

quote: The first posh meal out I had was on my 10th birthday.
name: Maxine Peake

quote: It was a big pleasure to play a Grand Slam match on my birthday.
name: Dominic Thiem

quote: For my 21st birthday party, I had a 'Strictly'-themed fancy dress.
name: Rachel Riley

quote: I'm an avid shoe fan. I got my first pair of Louboutins as a birthday gift from Jami Gertz.
name: Toks Olagundoye

quote: For my 11th birthday, I asked to be adopted.
name: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quote: My biggest hero, Gregory Peck, was my birthday present on April 14, 1973. I just sat and stared at him.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: I sing a little bit. I got a guitar for my 16th birthday.
name: Jesse Plemons

quote: I was fired by 'America's Next Top Model' on my birthday.
name: Paulina Porizkova

quote: In 1993 my birthday present was a star on Hollywood's Walk of Fame.
name: Annette Funicello

quote: I play PC and Xbox games at home, and I just got a PSP as a birthday present.
name: Uwe Boll

quote: I lost twins at 14 weeks, and I had to have an D and C on my birthday.
name: Amy Weber

quote: The only show my mother could afford to take me to when I was growing up was 'Cats', for my birthday.
name: Tammy Blanchard

quote: I remember, for my birthday once, we all dressed up as Spice Girls. I was Scary.
name: Hannah John-Kamen

quote: Brilliantly lit from stem to stern, she looked like a sagging birthday cake.
name: Walter Lord

quote: My brother got a .22 for his 12th birthday; I got a .22. He got a hunting knife; I got a hunting knife.
name: Stephanie Cutter

quote: With a recent birthday, I've been acting now for twenty years.
name: Thayer David

quote: Mattresses! Beautiful! Let's go buy a couple of mattresses. Give 'em to people for their birthday.
name: Lawrence Tierney

quote: I do like to shock and surprise people. When it's all in good fun, of course.
name: Ruth Warrick

quote: On my 30th birthday, all the presents I got were boxes of food. That's what I needed.
name: Kay Lenz
